instructions.log_file_name: Values: Empty or File absulote path & file name. If empty, log file will not be created.
instructions.default_param_file: Values: Empty, m, absolute path & file name. If empty or m (m=manual), the program will ask user to select parameter file
instructions.default_data_file:
Values: Empty, m, p, absolute path & file name. 
      If empty or m (m=manual), the program will ask user to select parameter file. 
      If p, the program will take the data file from the parameter file
instructions.print_validation_info_ind:
Values: True, False. If True, the program will print the first few lines of the dataframes for verification 
      Empty treated as False
instructions.gui_ind:
Values: True, False. If True, the program uses GUI for some of the ineractions with the user 
      Empty treated as False
